param.name: split_output_selector
param.label: Output
param.help: Select between a single output or separate outputs for each statistics

param.name: filter_flags
param.label: Set filter by flags
param.option: Filter by flags to exclude or require

param.name: gc_depth
param.label: GC-depth bin size
param.help: --GC-depth; decreasing bin size increases memory requirement; default = 20000.0

param.name: read_length
param.label: Minimum read length to generate statistics for

param.label: Report only the main part of inserts

param.name: use_ref_selector

param.help: --ref-seq; required for GC-depth and mismatches-per-cycle calculation

param.name: reference_source_selector
param.label: Choose a reference sequence for GC depth

tool.help:
**What it does**
This tool runs the ``samtools stats`` command. It has the following options::
-c, --coverage <int>,<int>,<int> Coverage distribution min,max,step [1,1000,1] -d, --remove-dups Exclude from statistics reads marked as duplicates -f, --required-flag <str|int> Required flag, 0 for unset. See also `samtools flags` [0] -F, --filtering-flag <str|int> Filtering flag, 0 for unset. See also `samtools flags` [0] --GC-depth <float> the size of GC-depth bins (decreasing bin size increases memory requirement) [2e4] -h, --help This help message -i, --insert-size <int> Maximum insert size [8000] -I, --id <string> Include only listed read group or sample name -l, --read-length <int> Include in the statistics only reads with the given read length [] -m, --most-inserts <float> Report only the main part of inserts [0.99] -q, --trim-quality <int> The BWA trimming parameter [0] -r, --ref-seq <file> Reference sequence (required for GC-depth and mismatches-per-cycle calculation). Galaxy will provide options for selecting a reference cached as this Galaxy instance or choosing one from history.
